channel.title: Privat server worlds
channel.description: hey i was wondering if someone could make a something that i can run my server with meny worlds? like the server.java file, the port is something like 4735 and if you make a server2.java and change teh port and so on then u got many worlds to the same character files and stuff right? if someone have made it allready and u know where it is can u post link xD?

item.title: Privat server worlds
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

well, you could have different worlds from 1 server

you make a server you make characters load from a character map,
but in that character map you put another server.

so server one loads characters from “./Characters/Characters/”
and server 2 loads characters from just “./Characters/”

and then you just need to change ports and you have 2 different worlds with the same characters to load.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tor0en wrote:

oh ok -.- i just made a new server folder xD and changed port and made shortcuts to teh charater files xD

item.title: Privat server worlds
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Worlds are generally for different servers, i.e. the same source code running at the same time on different PCs.

Read full topic
